Articles.Content:
Just noticed a survey pop up in the launcher, keep an eye out for it or maybe use the launcher this time if you don't and are interested in filling out the survey.

It's basic questions about how you're liking EA and the state of the game, with a few text fields if you feel like writing an essay.

I wonder if the development team reads the whole thing...   

I hope they like my post-modernist, classic, anti-anti-anti-anti-natalist, "legalize Uranium", pro-egg omelet, pre-industrial Shakespearean soliloquy on Jeb's hairline
